name: Mahjong Kyo Retsuden
overview: Mahjong Kyōretsuden bills itself as a "real mahjong game". With its contemporary setting and grounded characters, it aims for a realistic depiction of backstreet mahjong parlours. Uniquely, the player has the opportunity to create their own character; at the start of the game, the player can choose a short name and create their own character's look with a variety of different facial features.
